texts.overview: Place a [color=title]bomb[/color] that does not explode until you [color=title]manually detonate[/color] the bomb.
Place a [color=title]bomb[/color] that does not explode until you [color=title]manually detonate[/color] the bomb.
texts.manual:
Press @key to set down a [color=title]remote bomb[/color]. You will hear 3 beeps indicating that the bomb will remain [color=title]dormant[/color] until detonation.
Press @key a second time to activate detonation.

confirm.header:
If you unlock [color=title]Remote Bomb[/color], you will lose access to the [color=title]Mega Bomb[/color] skill.
As you upgrade this skill, you will gain the ability to place [color=title]multiple remote bombs[/color] and to then detonate all of them simultaneously.

receipt.footer: You will no longer have access to the [color=title]Mega Bomb[/color] skill.

texts.overview: The first [color=title]Remote Bomb[/color] upgrade allows you to place up to [color=title]2 remote bombs[/color] before triggering the detonation.
texts.manual:
Press @key to set down a [color=title]remote bomb[/color]. If you place a second bomb before detonating the first bomb, it too will remain [color=title]dormant[/color] until detonation.
Press @key a second time to activate detonation on one or both bombs.

receipt.footer: After you place one [color=title]remote bomb[/color], the next [color=title]regular bomb[/color] you place will automatically become a [color=dim]remote bomb[/color].

texts.overview: The last upgrade to [color=title]Remote Bomb[/color] enables you to place up to [color=title]3 remote bombs[/color] before triggering the detonation.
texts.manual:
Press @key to set down a [color=title]remote bomb[/color]. If you place a second and/or third bomb before detonating the first bomb, they too will remain [color=title]dormant[/color] until detonation.
Press @key a second time to activate detonation on all remote bombs.

confirm.footer: Doing so will fully upgrade your [color=title]Remote Bomb[/color] skill.

receipt.footer: After you place one [color=title]remote bomb[/color], the next [color=title]2 regular bombs[/color] you place will automatically become [color=dim]remote bombs[/color].

texts.overview: You have obtained the highest upgrade to [color=title]Remote Bomb[/color], enabling you to place up to [color=title]3 remote bombs[/color] before triggering the detonation.
